snippet: After charging the 81-year-old with “creating a disturbance,” officers hauled away computers and his cellphone, as well as books and periodicals.
abstract: Chinese security officers raid home of Beijing writer and underground publisher Tie Liu and detain him on charge of 'creating a disturbance.'
lead_paragraph: After charging the 81-year-old with “creating a disturbance,” officers hauled away computers and his cellphone, as well as books and periodicals.

headline.main: Police Detain Tie Liu, Beijing Writer and Underground Publisher

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
